item.description:
Event Description: December 16th, 2007 is the 234th anniversary of the Boston Tea Party!
The Boston Meetup is staging a re-enactment./

This could be a celebration of teh NH primary victory of Ron Paul, or a pre-primary event, but in either case, this is a significant historic day, a day to 'revolutionize' Boston Harbor to say the least.

234 years of downhill sliding - enough - l;et's throw some TVs off the Hancock tower - just kidding - but let's try to think of some symbolic gesture that will bring attention to the revolution and join our brothers and sistes in Boston for the big day.

They help us here in NH. Let's show them som e thanks and also make this a better event for everyone (maybe the national media will pick up on this) that Ron Paul supporters are serious about the revolution.

Rich
item.name: Boston Tea Party Re-enactment
